headline: General Dynamics Surges On Results; These Defense Stocks To Report
summary: General Dynamics stock surged out of a buy zone on Wednesday after its second-quarter report.  In a busy week for defense contractors, quarterly results have been mixed.  Lockheed Martin, RTX and Northrop Grumman reported on Tuesday.

raw.headline: General Dynamics Surges On Results; These Defense Stocks To Report
raw.summary: General Dynamics stock surged out of a buy zone on Wednesday after its second-quarter report.  In a busy week for defense contractors, quarterly results have been mixed.  Lockheed Martin, RTX and Northrop Grumman reported on Tuesday.

headline: General Aviation Community Unites to Support the 2026 Special Olympics Airlift
summary: OSHKOSH, Wis., July 23, 2025--During EAA AirVenture, leading general aviation organizations announced collective support and endorsement of the 2026 Special Olympics Airlift.

headline: Howmet's Transportation Market Shrinks: What's the Path Forward?
summary: HWM battles transportation market headwinds, but aerospace strength and F-35 orders help offset the drag.
